type: How to Install a New Market

definition.text: To install a new market, select Install Market on the menu of the market you wish to install. If the market is not set up, then you must set it up first.

translations.text: Para instalar un nuevo mercado, seleccione Install Market oen el menú del mercado que desea instalar.Si el mercado no está configurado, primero debe configurarlo.

paragraphs.text: For the details, please follow the Install New Market tutorial on the Getting Started Workspace.

translations.text: Para obtener más información, siga las instrucciones de instalación  en  New Market tutorial en el Getting Started Workspace.
